youtube.title: How Pimples are Formed: A Complete Biological Breakdown
youtube.description: Ever wondered what happens under your skin when a breakout occurs? In this video, we dive deep into the biology of acne, explaining how sebum, dead skin cells, and bacteria interact to create pimples. Learn the science behind your skin health!
